CustomField.description: This is the first time we heard from the customer about their desire to take a mortgage with us. For those who come though a lead pipeline, this is the date the lead is created. This is captured to allow us to understand the end to end timeframes from interest to brokered mortgage.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the first time we heard from the customer about their desire to take a mortgage with us. For those who come though a lead pipeline, this is the date the lead is created.
CustomField.label: Date of initial interest
